properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_TEL, MEMBER_NICK, PROFILE_IMG, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')AS ENROLL_DATE, SECESSION_FL, ADMIN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES(SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')AS CREATE_DT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET SECESSION_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?
SELECT * FROM BOARD B JOIN LIKE_LIST L ON(B.BOARD_NO = L.BOARD_NO) WHERE B.MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_PW = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET PROFILE_IMG = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NICK FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NICK = ? AND MEMBER_NO != ?
